meanings.definition: A Cajun dish typically made with shellfish, vegetables, and a spicy sauce.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious etouffees at the Cajun restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a flavorful batch of etouffees for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The etouffees danced on my taste buds with their spicy flavors.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering etouffees filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The colorful etouffees looked like a work of art on the plate.

meanings.sent1: She felt like the heavy blanket of responsibilities was starting to etouffees her.
meanings.sent2: The pillow seemed to etouffees the sound coming from the other room.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to etouffees the toy mouse under the rug.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room etouffees any chance of conversation.
meanings.sent5: The thick fog seemed to etouffees the entire town in a mysterious haze.
